author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ما لَمْ أَجِدْ سَبِيلاً إِلاَّ ما بَيَّنْتَهُ لأَصْفِيائِكَ؟ يَشْهَدُ كُلُّ الذَّرَّاتِ بِأَنَّكَ أَنْتَ اللَّهُ لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ لَمْ تَزَلْ كُنْتَ مُقْتَدِرًا عَلَى ما تَشآءُ وَحاكِمًا عَلَى ما تُرِيْدُ، قَدِّرْ لِي يا إِلهِي
translation: Whither shall I turn, O my God, powerless as I am to discover any other way except the way Thou didst set before Thy chosen Ones? All the atoms of the earth proclaim Thee to be God, and testify that there is none other God besides Thee. Thou hast from eternity been powerful to do what Thou hast willed, and to ordain what Thou hast pleased.
